subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Froome, the 2013 Tour champion, was unable to follow Nairo Quintana on the switchbacks of the 20th stage but stayed in position to win, with Sunday’s stage largely ceremonial.
snippet: Froome, the 2013 Tour champion, was unable to follow Nairo Quintana on the switchbacks of the 20th stage but stayed in position to win, with Sunday’s stage largely ceremonial.
